pydexpi.loaders.proteus_serializer module

class pydexpi.loaders.proteus_serializer.ProteusSerializer[source]

Bases: object

This class loads an XML file containing data in Proteus format into memory and transforms it into a Dexpi format.

load(dir_path: Path, filename: str)[source]

Transforms the data in the Proteus .xml file to a DexpiModel class.

Parameters:

  • dir_path (Path) – Directory where the proteus file is stored.

  • filename (str) – Filename of the proteus file.

Returns:

Loaded DEXPI model.

Return type:

DexpiModel

make_or_retrieve_class(class_type, proteus_id: str, proteus_element: Element | None = None, **kwargs)[source]

Creates a class with the id and the class type. If an object with this ID has been created before, the method returns this object, provided the class type matches. An exception is thrown otherwise. If no object with this ID is found, a new object is created and added to the _all_classes dictionary.

Parameters:

  • class_type (Any) – type of the class to be created

  • proteus_id (str) – ID of the object for the lookup table. Should be the proteus id if available

  • proteus_element (ET.Element, optional) – Corresponding proteus element, from which the generic attributes are parsed if not None

  • kwargs – keyword arguments to be passed to the constructor

Returns:

object corresponding to the ID

Return type:

class_type

parse_actuating_system() → list[source]

Parse proteus actuating system to DEXPI actuating system classes.

Returns:

DEXPI actuating system objects that have been created.

Return type:

list

parse_equipment()[source]

Parse all proteus equipment found in the root element to DEXPI equipment classes.

Returns:

A list of DEXPI equipment objects that have been created.

Return type:

list of Equipment

parse_generic_attributes(component_class, proteus_component: <module 'xml.etree.ElementTree' from '/usr/lib/python3.10/xml/etree/ElementTree.py'>) → dict[source]

Parse generic attributes from xml tree to DEXPI data classes.

Parameters:

  • component_class – DEXPI class for which we want to parse attributes

  • proteus_attributes (ET) – Proteus element tree of the DEXPI class.

Returns:

attributes, DEXPI data classes

Return type:

dict

parse_process_signal_generating_systems() → list[source]

Parses the process signal generating systems from a proteus xml element tree to DEXPI classes. Needs to be parsed before process instrumentation function.

Returns:

List of all system objects

Return type:

retrieve_piping_nodes(connection_point_owner)[source]

Get a list of piping nodes associated to a proteus connection_point owner (i.e. PipingNodeOwner in Dexpi). Create piping nodes new if non_existent and add them to self._piping_nodes_dict, or get them from self._piping_nodes_dict

Returns:

List of piping node objects associated to the connection_point_owner

Return type:

list(PipingNode)

save(model: DexpiModel, dir_path: Path, filename: str)[source]

Transforms a DexpiModel to the Proteus format. Not implemented yet.
